trans-unit.source: Represents the different data-entry modes of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表不同的資料輸入模式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewMode enumeration is used to represent the data-entry modes of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewMode 列舉用來代表的資料輸入模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the current mode of the control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前的控制項模式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: After an insert or update operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Insert 或 update 作業之後，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the control returns to read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，控制權會傳回以唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: You can specify an alternate mode to return to by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定替代的模式，以返回藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change modes programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式變更模式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式，則下表中的事件會引發。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|Occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項嘗試變更之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式，但模式實際變更之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|Occurs after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has changed from edit, insert, or read-only mode to another mode.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|之後，就會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項已從編輯、 插入或唯讀模式變更為另一個模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.|
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來執行工作時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An editing mode that allows the user to update the values of an existing record.
trans-unit.target: 編輯模式，可讓使用者更新現有記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: An inserting mode that allows the user to enter the values for a new record.
trans-unit.target: 插入模式，可讓使用者輸入新記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: A display mode that prevents the user from modifying the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: 防止使用者修改記錄的值的顯示模式。
